loan_status_sms.name: Application Completed
loan_status_sms.body: Hi {{contact.first_name}}! Great news - your mortgage application with LENDWISE is complete! I'll keep you updated as we move through processing. Questions? Just reply! - David, NMLS# 62043

loan_status_sms.name: Sent to Processing
loan_status_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, your loan file has been sent to processing! This is a big milestone. I'll update you as we progress toward underwriting. - David, LENDWISE 310-954-7772

loan_status_sms.name: Submitted to Underwriting
loan_status_sms.body: Hi {{contact.first_name}}! Your loan has been submitted to underwriting for review. This is exciting! I'll let you know as soon as we get a decision. - David, LENDWISE

loan_status_sms.name: Conditional Approval
loan_status_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}} - GREAT NEWS! Your loan is CONDITIONALLY APPROVED! Just a few items to clear. I'll be in touch with details. We're getting close! - David, LENDWISE

loan_status_sms.name: Loan Fully Approved
loan_status_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}} - YOUR LOAN IS FULLY APPROVED! All conditions cleared! We're moving to closing. I'll be in touch with next steps. CONGRATS! - David, LENDWISE

loan_status_sms.name: Clear to Close
loan_status_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}} - CLEARED TO CLOSE! You're almost home! I'll send final cash-to-close and coordinate your signing. Get ready for keys! - David, LENDWISE

loan_status_sms.name: Final Docs Ready
loan_status_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, your final loan docs are ready & heading to title! I'll contact you about closing details. IMPORTANT: Verify wire instructions by phone! - David, LENDWISE

loan_status_sms.name: Funded - Congratulations
loan_status_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}} - CONGRATULATIONS HOMEOWNER! Your loan has FUNDED! Welcome to your new home! It was an honor helping you. I'm always here for you. - David, LENDWISE

lead_nurture_sms.name: New Lead Immediate
lead_nurture_sms.body: Hi {{contact.first_name}}! This is David Young from LENDWISE Mortgage. I received your inquiry and would love to help with your home financing needs. When's a good time to chat? - David 310-954-7772

lead_nurture_sms.name: Day 1 Follow-Up
lead_nurture_sms.body: Hi {{contact.first_name}}, just checking in! Have you had a chance to think about your mortgage needs? I'm here to answer any questions. Current rates are very competitive! - David, LENDWISE

lead_nurture_sms.name: Day 3 Pre-Qual Offer
lead_nurture_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, did you know a pre-qualification takes just 15 mins? It's free and gives you a clear picture of your buying power. Want me to get you started? - David, LENDWISE

lead_nurture_sms.name: Day 7 Check-In
lead_nurture_sms.body: Hi {{contact.first_name}}! Still thinking about your home loan? I'm here whenever you're ready. No pressure, just let me know how I can help! - David Young, LENDWISE 310-954-7772

lead_nurture_sms.name: Day 14 Final
lead_nurture_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, I don't want to bother you - but I'm here whenever you need mortgage help! Feel free to reach out anytime. - David, LENDWISE Mortgage

appointment_sms.name: Appointment Confirmation
appointment_sms.body: Hi {{contact.first_name}}! Your call with David Young at LENDWISE Mortgage is confirmed for {{appointment.start_time}}. Looking forward to speaking with you!

appointment_sms.name: 24-Hour Reminder
appointment_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, reminder: Your call with David at LENDWISE is tomorrow at {{appointment.start_time}}. Reply YES to confirm or call 310-954-7772 to reschedule.

appointment_sms.name: 1-Hour Reminder
appointment_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, your call with David is in 1 hour! I'll be calling you at {{contact.phone}}. Talk soon! - LENDWISE Mortgage

appointment_sms.name: Missed Appointment
appointment_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, I missed you earlier! No worries - let me know a good time to reschedule. Just reply here or call 310-954-7772. - David, LENDWISE

post_close_sms.name: Closing Day Congrats
post_close_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}} - CONGRATULATIONS! You're officially a homeowner! What an amazing journey. Thank you for trusting LENDWISE. Enjoy your new home! - David

post_close_sms.name: Day 3 Thank You
post_close_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, hope you're settling in! If you had a great experience, would you consider leaving us a Google review? It helps others find their dream home! - David, LENDWISE

post_close_sms.name: 30-Day Check-In
post_close_sms.body: Hi {{contact.first_name}}! How's the new home? Just checking in to see if you have any questions about your mortgage. I'm always here to help! - David, LENDWISE

post_close_sms.name: Referral Request
post_close_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, know anyone looking to buy or refinance? I'd love to help them like I helped you! Just have them mention your name. Thanks! - David, LENDWISE

post_close_sms.name: Home Anniversary
post_close_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, happy HOME-iversary! Can you believe it's been a year? Hope you're loving your home. I'm always here for any mortgage needs! - David, LENDWISE

post_close_sms.name: Birthday Wishes
post_close_sms.body: Happy Birthday {{contact.first_name}}! Wishing you an amazing day filled with joy. Cheers from your friends at LENDWISE Mortgage! - David

prequal_sms.name: Pre-Qual Started
prequal_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, exciting news - your pre-qualification is in progress! I'll review your info and be in touch soon with your buying power! - David, LENDWISE

prequal_sms.name: Pre-Qual Complete
prequal_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}} - You're PRE-QUALIFIED! Check your email for your letter. You're ready to start house hunting! Questions? Call me! - David, LENDWISE 310-954-7772

prequal_sms.name: Documents Reminder
prequal_sms.body: Hi {{contact.first_name}}, friendly reminder: I still need a few documents to complete your pre-qual. Please check your email and upload when ready! - David, LENDWISE

rate_drop_sms.name: Rate Drop Alert
rate_drop_sms.body: {{contact.first_name}}, RATES JUST DROPPED! This could be a great time to refinance or buy. Want me to run the numbers for you? Reply YES or call 310-954-7772! - David, LENDWISE
